## FileContainer.read() method

Read file contents as a utf8 encoded string.

Signature:

```typescript
read(key: string): string;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description |
| --------- | ------ | ----------- |
| key       | string |             |

Returns:

string

## Example

```js
fsInstance.read("some/file.md");
```
